definition: to restrict/to agree to a contract/offer/bid
important/vital/to want/to ask for/will/going to (as future auxiliary)/may/must/(used in a comparison) must be/probably/if
to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale

sentences.english: Please note that your counter-offer is binding for seven days.
sentences.chinese: 請注意，您的反要約是有約束力的七天。

sentences.english: You mentioned that Qunar had acquisition offers.
sentences.chinese: 你提到去哪兒收到過收購要約。

sentences.english: Article 26 The acceptance becomes effective when the acceptance notice reaches the offeror.
sentences.chinese: 第二十六條承諾通知到達要約人時生效。

sentences.english: Bill was going to ask Lisa out on date, but he chickened out at the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 比爾本來要約麗莎出去，但是最後卻不敢開口。

sentences.english: A term sheet is a conditional offer.
sentences.chinese: 投資意向書是個有條件的要約。

sentences.english: Article 26 A notice of acceptance becomes effective once it reaches the offeror.
sentences.chinese: 第二十六條承諾通知到達要約人時生效。

sentences.english: Offeror, a single Shareholder, offers sale of all or part of his Shares.
sentences.chinese: 要約人，一個股東提出出售他的全部或一些股份。

sentences.english: Bill was going to ask Lisa out on a date, but he chickened out at the last minute.
sentences.chinese: 比爾本來要約麗莎出去玩，但是最後卻不敢開口。

sentences.english: An offer becomes effective when it reaches the offeree.
sentences.chinese: 要約到達受要約人時生效。

sentences.english: An offer becomes effective when it reaches the offeree.
sentences.chinese: 要約到達受要約人時生效。

sentences.english: An acceptance is a statement made by the offeree indicating assent to an offer.
sentences.chinese: 承諾是受要約人同意要約的意思表示。

sentences.english: An acceptance is a statement made by the offeree indicating assent to an offer.
sentences.chinese: 承諾是受要約人同意要約的意思表示。

sentences.english: A commercial advertisement is deemed an offer if its contents meet the requirements of an offer.
sentences.chinese: 商業廣告的內容符合要約規定的，視爲要約。

sentences.english: A commercial advertisement is deemed an offer if its contents meet the requirements of an offer.
sentences.chinese: 商業廣告的內容符合要約規定的，視爲要約。

sentences.english: The third chapter focuses the fiduciary duties of plan trustee in face of tender offer.
sentences.chinese: 第三章是面臨要約收購時計劃受託人的信義義務。

sentences.english: An acceptance once given cannot be revoked unless the offeror consents .
sentences.chinese: 除非要約人同意，承諾一經做出即不得撤回。

definition: to purchase (from various places)/to acquire (a company)
to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc)/to set up (a rule etc)
